**LEASE GOES UNTIL MARCH 2023, no short term subleases** option to renew
I’m looking for sublease or re-let my studio apartment in the south loop.
Move in time is flexible and the lease currently goes until March 2023.
The building has full amenities, a huge gym and rooftop patio, pool, golf simulator, basketball & racketball courts,
